column4: i have just installd ubuntu server, but i want to use xorg, what is the name?! isnt it xorg-x11? i cant find it, and xserver-xorg dosent seam to work, i cant start it with startx, why?
if you want to install ubuntu from a server install, do "sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop"
or you can do "apt-get install xserver-xorg gnome-desktop"
i did, but i cant start x, tried with startx but it dosent work
